comment:
>>38208974
Ok, seems like she's a little shellshocked over her acid spit experience; address her burns first, and see if the burns are a status effect in addition to just HP damage. Otherwise it's just about mind over matter, and there's not much you can do about a psychological aversion to pain.

Also props to Tatsumaki for somehow managing not to rupture bug juice all over herself despite being melee-focused.

>>38209029
>See if any of the bugs had anything worth looting.
Can items be damaged within your UI? If not, we should probably try and pick up one of the intact acid sacs for later reagent/weaponizing purposes. If so, I'd rather not have us being one bad jostle away from incinerate-dissolving our whole inventory.

Check how tall the hole in the wall is, and see if it looks like it's silverwing-made; carved out by scythe claws or acid burns. If so, we probably don't want to walk down them before sweeping them out with some serious ranged firepower.
